About Me

BIO

I'm a Software Development Engineer with good problem solving skill, a passion for crafting efficient software and interest towards quickly learning new technologies when need arises.

Software Engineer - Front End

Fourkites 04/2018 - Ongoing

What did I achieve in this role?

  • Developed single page web apps for new user-facing features using Angular 2 in a fast-paced startup environment with high levels of ownership and commitment
  • Developed reusable component using HTML, SCSS and Angular 2 with proper unit test cases using karma, Jasmine
  • Worked on map integration like Here maps, Map-box using Leaflet
  • Actively participate in backend development using ruby on rails, PSQL, Elastic Search, Redis
  • Did simple POC for backend service using NestJs framework to minimize context switching between backend & frontend web development ( NestJs follows Angular 2 code structure )

Member Technical Staff - Backend Developer

Zoho Corp 05/2016 - 04/2018

What did I achieve in this role?

  • Developed search features in search microservice like elastic search using Lucene library in Java, MySQL, DFS ( distributed file system - Hadoop ) and Tomcat server.
  • Developed batch processing operations in search service and reduced indexing time by ~10%.
  • Implemented Multi QueueMQ Caching Algorithm in search system for reducing searcher opening time, search time reduced ~2%.
  • Developed search performance anomaly detection and send daily report to emails using Java and SendGrid.
